detail.title: On-click (popunder)
detail.cta: Buy Onclick traffic / CPM & CPA goal
detail.lead: Get leads with most popular ad format

card.title: What are popunder ads or onclick ads?
card.description: On-click popunder is an additional window that appears when the user makes a first click on the content page. It is one of the most effective ways to attract users' attention! We offer both mobile and desktop popunders, they are user-friendly and meet all Google requirements. When a user clicks anywhere on the page, a new window opens in the browser. The page remains invisible to the user, as the main page remains open
